task.title: Comparing a commited revision with the working copy
task.shortdesc: You can see the difference between the version of a file in your working copy and one of the previously commited versions.

step.cmd: From the view, open the history of the current branch or one of the files in the staging area.
In the commit log, select the commit that you want to see the details of.
In the list of commited changes, right-click a file and select Compare with working copy version.
